item.title: Introducing the Xbox CosPups inspired by the Chinese zodiac
item.description: Source: Xbox. The Xbox Cospups. To celebrate the Year of the Dog, Xbox has created the Xbox CosPups. This group of canine characters embodies traits of the Chinese zodiac through their portrayal of famous gaming characters and worlds. “Cospups” refers to dogs participating in “cosplay,” which involves dressing up as characters from different forms of media like books, games, and movies. The Xbox CosPups have names such as Master Chihuahua, Sea of Fleas, Mutt-cus Fenix, Fur-za, and the small but mighty PUG-G.

item.title: Recycle Video Games and Gaming Systems
item.description: Think about all the video games and gaming systems you have in your home, even the ones tucked away. You probably have quite a collection! Wouldn’t it be great to turn those unused games and consoles into cash? Instead of letting them gather dust, you could use the money to buy whatever you want, including the newest games and systems. Selling your old gaming stuff can be a hassle, but it doesn’t have to be.
